Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding two incised hoes; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot; the figure is broken into two at the ankle.
Condition: broken into two pieces at ankle level
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
